original_title: Arrombada - Vou Mijar na Porra do Seu Túmulo
overview: A girl (Ljana Carrion) is kidnapped by a drug dealer (Vinnie Bressan) at the behest of a corrupt senator (Coffin Souza), who intends to hold a party in the presence of a demented priest (PC) and a doctor (Gurcius Gewdner) using the girl as fun.
title: Arrombada - I Will Piss in Your Grave
